episodes.title: Episode #6.1
episodes.plot: Lady Mary's past catches up with her when an unwelcome visitor delivers an ultimatum, and news about the running of Downton Hospital puts Violet on the warpath.

episodes.title: Episode #6.2
episodes.plot: What begins as a happy day out for the family and servants ends in panic and leaves Robert with a difficult decision to make.

episodes.title: Episode #6.3
episodes.plot: An old acquaintance comes to Edith's aid, while Mr Carson and Mrs Hughes' big day brings an unexpected arrival.

episodes.title: Episode #6.4
episodes.plot: Anna and Mary face a crisis and a figure from the past surprises those above and below stairs.

episodes.title: Episode #6.5
episodes.plot: Violet embroils the Minister of Health in the hospital row, but his visit ends in catastrophe. Mary's suspicions are aroused.

episodes.title: Episode #6.6
episodes.plot: Downton Abbey opens its doors to the public for charity, Barrow's actions are misconstrued, Mary and Henry's romance blossoms, and tensions between Cora and Violet reach a dramatic climax.

episodes.title: Episode #6.7
episodes.plot: The family face a shocking turn of events at Brooklands racetrack while Molesley and Daisy are put to the test.

episodes.title: Episode #6.8
episodes.plot: Romance blossoms but a betrayal of trust threatens the chance of lasting happiness. Thomas considers desperate measures.

episodes.title: Christmas Special
episodes.plot: Mary endeavors to build bridges with her sister while Edith's secret continues to pose a threat. As Henry settles into the role of husband and stepfather, finding his place at Downton proves more difficult.
